tiles.title: Most Visited Workspaces
tiles.description: Top 10 workspaces visited by Fabric users

tiles.title: Interactions by Item Types
tiles.description: Top 10 item types accessed by Fabric users

tiles.title: Interactions by Fabric Items
tiles.description: Top 10 artifacts accessed by Fabric users

tiles.title: Common Workspace Actions
tiles.description: Top 10 workspace events by Fabric users

tiles.title: Regressed Jobs Alert
tiles.description: Today's regressed jobs compared to last 60 days

parameters.description: Threshold value of slope when exceeded an activator alert is initiated

queries.text:
materialized_view('dailyAggWorkspaceEvents')
|where ['time'] between (_startTime .. _endTime )
|summarize visits = sum(eventCount) by workspaceName
|sort by visits desc 
|take 10

materialized_view("dailyAggWorkspaceEvents")
|where ["time"] between (_startTime .._endTime )
|summarize visits = sum(eventCount) by itemKind
|sort by visits desc nulls first  
|take 10

materialized_view("dailyAggWorkspaceEvents")
|where ["time"] between (_startTime .._endTime )
|summarize visits = sum(eventCount) by itemName, itemKind
|sort by visits desc nulls first

materialized_view("dailyAggWorkspaceEvents")
|where ["time"] between (_startTime .._endTime )
|extend shortType = replace_string(type,"Microsoft.Fabric.Item","")
|summarize visits = sum(eventCount) by shortType
|sort by visits desc nulls first

materialized_view("dailyAggWorkspaceEvents")
|where ["time"] between (_startTime .._endTime )
|summarize visits = sum(eventCount) by executingPrincipalId, executingPrincipalType
|sort by visits desc nulls first

materialized_view('dailyAggJobEvents')
|where ["time"] between (_startTime .._endTime ) and jobStatus == 'Completed'
|summarize jobs = count() by jobType

materialized_view('dailyAggJobEvents')
| where ["time"] between (_startTime .._endTime ) and jobStatus == "Completed"
| extend jobDurationMin = datetime_diff('minute', jobEndTimeUtc,jobCreatedTimeUtc)
| summarize avgjobDurationMin =round(avg(jobDurationMin)),
            instanceCount = count() by itemName

materialized_view('dailyAggJobEvents')
| where ["time"] between (_startTime .._endTime ) and jobStatus == "Completed"
| summarize jobCount = count() by jobInvokeType

jobEventsExpanded
|where ["time"] between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| summarize jobCount = count() by type= replace_string(type,"Microsoft.Fabric.JobEvents.Item",""), workspaceName, itemName
| order by jobCount desc nulls last

materialized_view("dailyAggJobEvents")
|where ["time"] between (_startTime.._endTime)
| summarize  jobcount= count() by bin(datetime_part('hour',jobScheduleTimeUtc), 1), itemName

let span = 1d;
materialized_view("dailyAggJobEvents")
| where ["time"] between (_startTime .._endTime ) and isnotempty(itemName)
| where itemName in (_itemName) or   isempty( _itemName)
| extend jobDurationMin = datetime_diff('minute',jobEndTimeUtc,jobStartTimeUtc)
| make-series tsDurationMin = avg(jobDurationMin) default=int(null) on ["time"] from _startTime to _endTime step span by itemName
| extend tsDurationMin = series_fill_linear(tsDurationMin) //fill missing null values with linear interpolation
| extend (anamolies, score,baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(tsDurationMin,1.5,-1,"linefit")
| project itemName,tsDurationMin, anamolies,["time"]

materialized_view("dailyAggStorageEvents")
| where ["time"] between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where type in (_type) or isempty( _type)
| summarize count = count() by bin(["time"],1d), type

materialized_view("dailyAggStorageEvents")
| where ["time"] between (_startTime.._endTime)
| where type in (_type) or isempty( _type)
| summarize count = sum(oneLakeCount) by type, subject
|order by  count desc

materialized_view("dailyAggStorageEvents")
| where ["time"] between (_startTime.._endTime)
| where type in (_type) or isempty( _type)
// | extend shortType = replace_string(type,"Microsoft.Fabric.OneLake.","")
| summarize count = sum(oneLakeCount) by type

materialized_view("dailyAggStorageEvents")
| where ["time"] between (_startTime.._endTime)
| where type in (_type) or isempty( _type)
| summarize count = sum(oneLakeCount) by api, type

let span = 1d;
let horizon = 14d;
materialized_view("dailyAggJobEvents")
| where ["time"] between (_startTime .._endTime ) and isnotnull(itemName)
| where itemName in (_itemName) or isempty( _itemName)
| extend jobDurationMin = datetime_diff('minute',jobEndTimeUtc,jobStartTimeUtc)
| make-series tsJobDurationMin = avg(jobDurationMin) default=int(null) on ["time"] from _startTime to _endTime+horizon step span by itemName
| extend tsJobDurationMin = series_fill_linear(tsJobDurationMin) // fill missing null values with interpolated data
| extend forecast = series_decompose_forecast(tsJobDurationMin,toint(horizon/span),-1,"linefit")

let span = 1d;
materialized_view("dailyAggStorageEvents")
| where ["time"] between (_startTime .._endTime )
| where type in (_type) or isempty( _type)
| make-series tsCount = count() default=int(null) on ["time"] from _startTime to _endTime step span by type
| extend tsCount = series_fill_linear(tsCount) // replace missing null values with interpolated data
| extend (anamolies, score,baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(tsCount,1.5,-1,"linefit")
|project tsCount,anamolies, type, ["time"]

jobEventsExpanded
| where ["time"] between (_startTime .._endTime ) 
| summarize jobCount = count() by type = replace_string(type,"Microsoft.Fabric.JobEvents.Item","")

let minTs = now()-60d; //last n days
let maxTs = now(); 
materialized_view("dailyAggJobEvents")
| where ["time"] between (minTs ..maxTs) and isnotempty( itemName) 
| extend jobDurationMin = datetime_diff('minute',jobEndTimeUtc,jobStartTimeUtc)
| make-series tsJobDurationMin = avg(jobDurationMin) default= long(null) on ["time"] from minTs to maxTs step 1d by itemName
| extend tsJobDurationMin = series_fill_linear(tsJobDurationMin) // replace null values with interpolated data
| extend (rsquare, slope) = series_fit_line(tsJobDurationMin)
| project itemName, slope
| where slope>_slopeThreshold
| order by slope desc

let span = 1d;
let minTs = now()-1d;
let maxTs = now();
materialized_view("dailyAggJobEvents")
| where ["time"] between (minTs..maxTs) and isnotempty(itemName)
| extend jobDurationMin = datetime_diff('minute',jobEndTimeUtc,jobStartTimeUtc)
| make-series tsDurationMin = avg(jobDurationMin) default=int(null) on ["time"] from minTs to maxTs step span by itemName
| extend tsDurationMin = series_fill_linear(tsDurationMin) //fill missing null values with linear interpolation
| extend (anamolies, score,baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(tsDurationMin,1.5,-1,"linefit")
| where isnotnull(anamolies) and array_index_of( anamolies,1) !=-1
| summarize jobcount = count() by itemName

materialized_view("dailyAggStorageEvents")
|distinct type
|order by type asc

materialized_view("dailyAggJobEvents")
|where isnotnull(itemName)
|distinct itemName
|order by itemName asc
